attributes.action: to bring back the death sentance for those who kill a child or take someone elses life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make laws tougher on peadophiles and sex offenders why should we the tax payer pay for new identitys for them to protect there human rights?? they gave them up when they touched a child inappropiately.
if a peadophile murders a child then they should have there life taken aswell a life for a life bring back the death sentence for all people who murder children and all people who take a life instead of overcrowding the jails with these monsters

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
